ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
fusepyng is a Python module that provides a simple interface to FUSE on
various operating systems. It's just one file and is implemented using
ctypes.

fusepyng is a fork of fusepy. We keep our code in sync with new code from
there.
about.summary: Simple ctypes bindings for FUSE - a fork of fusepy

about.description:
fusepyng is a Python module that provides a simple interface to FUSE on
various operating systems. It's just one file and is implemented using
ctypes.

fusepyng is a fork of fusepy. We keep our code in sync with new code from
there.
about.summary: Simple ctypes bindings for FUSE - a fork of fusepy

name: fusepyng
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "fusepyng" %}
{% set version = "1.0.7" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8b4f6ef81e8600f23da7509169acb2615582ef116d46a2a1ad4b7e530d8f899f

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    # Ideally, we'd have a CDT dependency on libfuse here.

test:
  requires:
    - python {{ python_min }}
  imports:
    - fusepyng

about:
  home: https://github.com/rianhunter/fusepyng
  license: ISC
  license_family: BSD
  # https://github.com/fusepy/fusepy/pull/126
  license_file: '{{ environ["RECIPE_DIR"] }}/LICENSE'
  summary: 'Simple ctypes bindings for FUSE - a fork of fusepy'
  description: |
    fusepyng is a Python module that provides a simple interface to FUSE on
    various operating systems. It's just one file and is implemented using
    ctypes.

    fusepyng is a fork of fusepy. We keep our code in sync with new code from
    there.
  dev_url: https://github.com/rianhunter/fusepyng

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - djsutherland
